description: Bug 707554 is about DHCP traffic not getting through the iptables filter. While that's perfectly valid, the fact that this doesn't affect cases where the dhcp server runs on the same host means there are ways around the filtering.
title: Local traffic (host->guest) escapes filtering in some cases
